entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 19 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 14 except minus 19 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 7:22 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:22 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:22 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
